destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.description: Ancient capital of Japan known for its traditional architecture, zen gardens, and tea ceremonies.

destinations.name: Santorini
destinations.description: Stunning volcanic island with white-washed buildings, blue domes, and spectacular Mediterranean views.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu
destinations.description: Ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, offering breathtaking views and rich history.

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.description: Vibrant coastal city with Table Mountain backdrop, offering diverse culture, wine routes, and beaches.

destinations.name: Reykjavik
destinations.description: Gateway to Iceland's natural wonders, including geothermal pools, glaciers, and the Northern Lights.

destinations.name: Bangkok
destinations.description: Bustling capital with ornate temples, floating markets, and world-renowned street food scene.

destinations.name: Venice
destinations.description: Unique city of canals and bridges, famous for its Gothic architecture and carnival celebrations.

destinations.name: Dubai
destinations.description: Ultra-modern city rising from the desert, known for luxury shopping, futuristic architecture.

destinations.name: Queenstown
destinations.description: Adventure capital of the world, surrounded by dramatic mountains and crystal-clear lakes.

destinations.name: Marrakech
destinations.description: Historic imperial city with vibrant souks, palaces, and gardens in North Africa.

destinations.name: Banff
destinations.description: Stunning mountain town in the Canadian Rockies, famous for its turquoise lakes and wildlife.

destinations.name: Barcelona
destinations.description: Vibrant city known for Gaudi's architecture, Mediterranean beaches, and Catalan culture.

destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: Tropical paradise with rice terraces, temples, and world-class surfing beaches.

destinations.name: Prague
destinations.description: Fairy-tale city with medieval architecture, famous for its castle, beer, and cultural heritage.

destinations.name: Rio de Janeiro
destinations.description: Vibrant city between mountains and sea, home to Christ the Redeemer and Copacabana Beach.

destinations.name: Swiss Alps
destinations.description: Majestic mountain range offering world-class skiing, hiking, and breathtaking scenery.

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: Ancient city carved into rose-colored rock faces, one of the world's most famous archaeological sites.

destinations.name: Maldives
destinations.description: Paradise archipelago with overwater bungalows, crystal clear waters, and coral reefs.

destinations.name: Edinburgh
destinations.description: Historic capital with medieval castle, rich cultural scene, and famous festivals.

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.description: Ultra-modern metropolis blending cutting-edge technology with traditional culture.

destinations.name: Great Barrier Reef
destinations.description: World's largest coral reef system, perfect for diving and underwater exploration.

destinations.name: Amsterdam
destinations.description: Charming city of canals, cycling culture, world-class museums, and historic architecture.

destinations.name: Havana
destinations.description: Colorful capital with vintage cars, colonial architecture, and vibrant music scene.

destinations.name: Safari
destinations.description: Experience the ultimate wildlife adventure in the African savanna.

destinations.name: Vienna
destinations.description: Imperial city known for classical music, coffee house culture, and grand architecture.

destinations.name: Cinque Terre
destinations.description: Five colorful coastal villages connected by scenic hiking trails along the Italian Riviera.

destinations.name: Seoul
destinations.description: Dynamic city blending ancient temples with K-pop culture and cutting-edge technology.

destinations.name: Yellowstone
destinations.description: First national park in the world, famous for geothermal features and diverse wildlife.

destinations.name: Istanbul
destinations.description: Historic city straddling two continents, known for grand mosques and bustling bazaars.

destinations.name: Amalfi Coast
destinations.description: Dramatic coastline with picturesque towns, Mediterranean views, and excellent cuisine.
